extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • name

        public T name(java.lang.String layerName)
        Layer name assigns layer string name. Allows easier differentiation between layers.

      • activation

        public T activation(java.lang.String activationFunction)
        Layer activation function. Typical values include:
        "relu" (rectified linear), "tanh", "sigmoid", "softmax", "hardtanh", "leakyrelu", "maxout", "softsign", "softplus"

      • weightInit

        public T weightInit(WeightInit weightInit)
        Weight initialization scheme.
        See Also:
        WeightInit

      • biasInit

        public T biasInit(double biasInit)

      • dist

        public T dist(Distribution dist)
        Distribution to sample initial weights from. Used in conjunction with .weightInit(WeightInit.DISTRIBUTION).

      • learningRate

        public T learningRate(double learningRate)
        Learning rate. Defaults to 1e-1

      • biasLearningRate

        public T biasLearningRate(double biasLearningRate)
        Bias learning rate. Set this to apply a different learning rate to the bias

      • learningRateSchedule

        public T learningRateSchedule(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> learningRateSchedule)
        Learning rate schedule. Map of the iteration to the learning rate to apply at that iteration.

      • l1

        public T l1(double l1)
        L1 regularization coefficient.

      • l2

        public T l2(double l2)
        L2 regularization coefficient.

      • dropOut

        public T dropOut(double dropOut)

      • momentum

        public T momentum(double momentum)
        Momentum rate.

      • momentumAfter

        public T momentumAfter(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> momentumAfter)
        Momentum schedule. Map of the iteration to the momentum rate to apply at that iteration.

      • updater

        public T updater(Updater updater)
        Gradient updater. For example, SGD for standard stochastic gradient descent, NESTEROV for Nesterov momentum, RSMPROP for RMSProp, etc.
        See Also:
        Updater

      • rho

        public T rho(double rho)
        Ada delta coefficient, rho. Only applies if using .updater(Updater.ADADELTA)
        Parameters:
        rho -

      • rmsDecay

        public T rmsDecay(double rmsDecay)
        Decay rate for RMSProp. Only applies if using .updater(Updater.RMSPROP)

      • epsilon

        public T epsilon(double epsilon)
        Epsilon value for updaters: Adagrad and Adadelta. Only used if using Updater.ADAGRAD or Updater.ADADELTA
        Parameters:
        epsilon - Epsilon value to use for adagrad and adadelta

      • adamMeanDecay

        public T adamMeanDecay(double adamMeanDecay)
        Mean decay rate for Adam updater. Only applies if using .updater(Updater.ADAM)

      • adamVarDecay

        public T adamVarDecay(double adamVarDecay)
        Variance decay rate for Adam updater. Only applies if using .updater(Updater.ADAM)

      • gradientNormalization

        public T gradientNormalization(GradientNormalization gradientNormalization)
        Gradient normalization strategy. Used to specify gradient renormalization, gradient clipping etc.
        Parameters:
        gradientNormalization - Type of normalization to use. Defaults to None.
        See Also:
        GradientNormalization

      • gradientNormalizationThreshold

        public T gradientNormalizationThreshold(double threshold)
        Threshold for gradient normalization, only used for GradientNormalization.ClipL2PerLayer, GradientNormalization.ClipL2PerParamType, and GradientNormalization.ClipElementWiseAbsoluteValue
        Not used otherwise.
        L2 threshold for first two types of clipping, or absolute value threshold for last type of clipping.

      • learningRateDecayPolicy

        public T learningRateDecayPolicy(LearningRatePolicy policy)
        Learning rate decay policy. Used to adapt learning rate based on policy.
        Parameters:
        policy - Type of policy to use. Defaults to None.
        See Also:
        GradientNormalization

      • build

        public abstract <E extends Layer> E build()
